task.title: Create a New Project
task.shortdesc: Here's a step-by-step guide on how to create a new project in the TaskFlow ProSync application.

step.cmd: Open the TaskFlow ProSync application and log in to your account.
Navigate to the "Projects" module using the top navigation bar.
Click on the New Project button.
Fill in the required project details, such as name and description.
Save the project to complete the creation process.
